subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The team unveiled a new sign in left field in honor of Gary Carter, who died in February, and all the current players wore his No. 8 shirt during pregame warm-ups.
snippet: The team unveiled a new sign in left field in honor of Gary Carter, who died in February, and all the current players wore his No. 8 shirt during pregame warm-ups.
